r.s: Fast creation of valid XML with DTD control.
r.d:
- Easy way to make valid XML : $x->div( $x->h1("Example"), $x->p("Hello"), $x->p(array('class'=>'example'), "World !") ) - Option to report DTD errors in your XML : Use internal tool or external program [ Require XML_DTD package ] - Use output driver of your choice : Text : return string XML_Tree : return XML_Tree object [ Require XML_Tree package ] - Translate option to quickly transform tags by anothers : ex: Convert your XML to XHTML : Example =>

Example

- Include a PHP program to quickly transform HTML to FastCreate syntax. [ Require XML_HTMLSax package ] - See examples for more informations : http://lya.no-ip.com/pear/XML_FastCreate/tests/
r.n: This is the first version of XML_FastCreate.
